title: The truth about vaccines & autism
description: We debunk the myths and bring you the facts about the heated debate over what vaccines have to do with autism with Autism Speaks Senior Vice President, Dr. Paul Wang.
cleaned_text: IE 11 is not supported. For an optimal experience visit our site on another browser.
